name: trending
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool youtube_trending.
Tool description: Unofficial API to gather video information from the trending section of Youtube
API description: Fetches trending YouTube videos for a specific category and country using the Toolbench RapidAPI.

type.description: The category of trending videos. Can be 'default', 'music', 'gaming', or 'movies'. Defaults to 'gaming'.

country.description: The country code for which to retrieve trending videos, e.g., 'US', 'DE', 'JP'. Defaults to 'US'.
